titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon, to the inhabitants of his county of Oxon.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our court at Oxford, the third day of November, in the eighteenth yeare of Our reigne.".
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
